songs.title: Leave Me Lonely (Reprise)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse]
There's a dangerous love, boy
You're no good for me, darling
Yeah, you turn me away like I'm begging for a dollar
Danger, baby
Oh, how you hold me
I get a chill inside
And nothing frightens me darlin'

[Bridge]
Danger, danger, dangerous darlin'
Danger, danger, dangerous boy
Danger, danger, dangerous darlin'
He's a dangerous boy

[Outro]
Na-na-na-na-na
Na-na-na-na-na baby
Na-na-na-na-na
Na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na
Na-na-na-na-na (baby)
Na-na-na-na-na baby
Na-na-na-na-na (na-na-na)
He's a dangerous boy
